name: Acid Splash
description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage. This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs. At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several. At Higher Levels, you create one more dart for each slot above 1st.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

name: Fireball
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried. At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

name: Guidance
description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

name: Banishment
components: V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)
description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

name: Mage Armor
components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)
description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target’s base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss it as an action.

name: Bless
components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw. At Higher Levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot above 1st.

name: Fire Bolt
description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack; on a hit, the target takes fire damage. The damage scales with level.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range; on a hit, it takes cold damage and its speed is reduced until your next turn.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a jolt. Make a melee spell attack; on a hit, lightning damage and the target can’t take reactions until its next turn.

name: Light
components: V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
description: You touch an object to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

name: Mage Hand
description: A spectral hand appears at a point you choose within range. It can manipulate objects, open doors, stow or retrieve items.

name: Minor Illusion
description: Create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration; examination reveals the illusion.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: Manifest a minor wonder: booming voice, flickering flames, harmless tremors, or similar effects.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature; it must succeed on a Dexterity save or take radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this save.

name: Poison Spray
description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see and project a puff of noxious gas. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take poison damage.

name: Prestidigitation
description: Perform minor magical tricks: clean, soil, chill, warm, flavor, light or snuff candles, and other simple effects.

name: Burning Hands
description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth. Creatures in a 15-foot cone make a Dexterity save, taking fire damage on a fail or half on success.

name: Detect Magic
description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet and can learn its school with an action.

name: Feather Fall
components: V, M (a small feather or down)
description: Choose up to five falling creatures; their rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends.

name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you makes a Constitution save, taking thunder damage and possibly being pushed.

name: Invisibility
components: V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. The spell ends early if the target attacks or casts a spell.

name: Lightning Bolt
components: V, S, M (a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass)
description: A stroke of lightning forming a line blasts out from you. Each creature in the line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking lightning damage on a fail or half on success.

name: Sleep
components: V, S, M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket)
description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures the spell can affect, starting with the lowest current HP. No save; ends on damage or an action to shake awake.

name: Charm Person
description: Attempt to charm a humanoid you can see. It must make a Wisdom save or be charmed by you until the spell ends or you harm it.

name: Disguise Self
description: You make yourself—including clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends.

name: Shield of Faith
components: V, S, M (a small parchment with a bit of holy text)
description: +2 bonus to AC for a creature of your choice within range for the duration.

name: Protection from Evil and Good
components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
description: Protects a willing creature against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead: disadvantage to be charmed, frightened, or possessed; attacks have disadvantage.

name: Guiding Bolt
description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice; on a hit, radiant damage and the next attack roll made against the target has advantage before the end of your next turn.

name: Entangle
description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range, restraining creatures on a failed Strength save.

name: Goodberry
components: V, S, M (a sprig of mistletoe)
description: Up to ten magical berries appear in your hand, infused with magic for nourishment and healing.

name: Grease
components: V, S, M (a bit of pork rind or butter)
description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point; the area becomes difficult terrain and creatures entering or starting there must save or fall prone.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range; make a ranged spell attack for each ray.

name: Web
components: V, S, M (a bit of spiderweb)
description: Thick, sticky webs fill a 20-foot cube; the area is difficult terrain and can restrain creatures that fail a Dexterity save.

name: Mirror Image
description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space, protecting you from attacks.

name: Misty Step
description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Hold Person
components: V, S, M (a small piece of iron)
description: Choose a humanoid that you can see; it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

name: Levitate
components: V, S, M (either a small leather loop or a piece of golden wire bent into a cup shape)
description: One creature or object of your choice rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended for the duration.

name: Darkness
components: V, M (bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal)
description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose, creating a heavily obscured area that blocks darkvision.

name: Shatter
components: V, S, M (a chip of mica)
description: A sudden loud ringing noise painfully intense erupts; creatures in a 10-foot sphere must make a Constitution save, taking thunder damage on a fail or half on success.

name: Blur
description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you; attackers have disadvantage.

name: Fly
components: V, S, M (a wing feather from any bird)
description: You touch a willing creature; it gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

name: Counterspell
description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell; the spell fails if its level is equal to or less than the slot used.

name: Dispel Magic
description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect; any spell of 3rd level or lower ends. For higher level spells, make an ability check.

name: Haste
components: V, S, M (a shaving of licorice root)
description: Choose a willing creature; its speed is doubled, gains +2 bonus to AC, advantage on Dexterity saves, and an additional action on each of its turns.

name: Chill Touch
description: A ghostly skeletal hand clings to a creature; on a hit, it deals necrotic damage and the target can't regain hit points until your next turn.

name: Mending
description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, no larger than 1 foot in any dimension.

name: Message
components: V, S, M (a short piece of copper wire)
description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message; only the target hears it and can reply in a whisper.

name: Resistance
description: Touch one willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the result to one saving throw of its choice.

name: Spare the Dying
description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points; the creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: True Strike
description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target; on your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against it.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments; on a failed Wisdom save, the target takes psychic damage and has disadvantage on the next attack roll.

name: Druidcraft
description: Whisper to the spirits of nature: predict weather, create small sensory effects, or make small flowers bloom.

name: Produce Flame
description: A flickering flame appears in your hand; it sheds light, and you can hurl it to deal fire damage with a ranged spell attack.

name: Shillelagh
components: V, S, M (mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff)
description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power; you can use your spellcasting ability for attack and damage rolls.

name: Bane
components: V, S, M (a drop of blood)
description: Up to three creatures of your choice make Charisma saves; on a fail, subtract 1d4 from attack rolls and saving throws while the spell lasts.

name: Command
description: Speak a one-word command to a creature; on a failed Wisdom save, it follows the command on its next turn if it can.

name: Comprehend Languages
components: V, S, M (a pinch of soot and salt)
description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language you hear and any written language you see.

name: Sanctuary
components: V, S, M (a small silver mirror)
description: You ward a creature; creatures must make a Wisdom save to target it with an attack or harmful spell. The ward ends if the warded creature attacks or casts a spell that affects an enemy.

name: Aid
components: V, S, M (a tiny strip of white cloth)
description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve; three creatures' hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

name: Darkvision
components: V, S, M (either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)
description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in darkness as if it were dim light out to 60 feet.

name: Enlarge/Reduce
components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron)
description: You cause a creature or object to grow or shrink. Enlarge grants advantage on Strength checks and saves; Reduce imposes disadvantage and lowers damage.

name: Lesser Restoration
description: You touch a creature and can end one disease or one condition afflicting it, such as blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: Animate Dead
components: V, S, M (a drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust)
description: This spell creates an undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range; it becomes a skeleton or zombie under your control.

name: Daylight
description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of bright light spreads from a point you choose. It dispels darkness of 3rd level or lower created by spells.

name: Remove Curse
description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the item can be removed.

name: Water Breathing
components: V, S, M (a short reed or piece of straw)
description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range; make a ranged spell attack for force damage. The number of beams increases at higher levels.

name: Healing Word
description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Identify
components: V, S, M (a pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather)
description: You choose one object that you must touch; if it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them.

name: Faerie Fire
description: Each object in a 20-foot cube is outlined in light; affected creatures shed dim light and attacks against them have advantage if the attacker can see them.

name: Alarm
components: V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)
description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion; choose a door, a window, or an area within range.

name: Create or Destroy Water
components: V, S, M (a drop of water if creating water or a few grains of sand if destroying it)
description: Create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in open containers, or destroy up to 10 gallons of water.

name: Detect Poison and Disease
description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

name: Purify Food and Drink
description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice becomes purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

name: Fog Cloud
description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range; the sphere spreads around corners and the area is heavily obscured.

name: Jump
components: V, S, M (a grasshopper's hind leg)
description: You touch a creature; its jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

name: Longstrider
components: V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)
description: You touch a creature; the target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

name: Expeditious Retreat
description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace; you can take the Dash action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

name: Barkskin
components: V, S, M (a handful of oak bark)
description: You touch a willing creature; until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: You can blind or deafen a foe; choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded or deafened for the duration.

name: Enhance Ability
components: V, S, M (fur or a feather from a beast)
description: You touch a creature and bestow a magical enhancement; choose one ability score to grant advantage on related checks and an additional benefit depending on the choice.

name: Gust of Wind
description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose; it disperses gas or vapor and can push creatures.

name: Knock
description: Choose an object that you can see within range; a loud knock, audible from as far away as 300 feet, emanates from the target and it becomes unlocked, unbarred, or unsealed.

name: See Invisibility
components: V, S, M (a pinch of talc and a small sprinkling of powdered silver)
description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane.

name: Spider Climb
components: V, S, M (a drop of bitumen and a spider)
description: You touch a willing creature; until the spell ends, the creature gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings.

name: Clairvoyance
components: V, S, M (a focus worth at least 100 gp, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing)
description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you; you can hear or see through the sensor.

name: Magic Circle
components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp)
description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy that hedges out celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead.

name: Protection from Energy
description: A willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

name: Sleet Storm
components: V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)
description: A 20-foot-tall cylinder of freezing rain and sleet creates difficult terrain, heavily obscures the area, and extinguishes flames.

name: Stinking Cloud
components: V, S, M (a rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves)
description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas; the area is heavily obscured and creatures that fail a Constitution save spend their action retching and reeling.

name: Water Walk
components: V, S, M (a piece of cork)
description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.

name: Revivify
components: V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes)
description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point.

name: Blade Ward
description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air; you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.

name: Dancing Lights
components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm)
description: You create up to four torch-sized lights that hover and move as you direct within range.

name: Animal Friendship
components: V, S, M (a morsel of food)
description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm; on a failed Wisdom save, it is charmed by you for the duration.

name: False Life
components: V, S, M (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)
description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for the duration.

name: Hellish Rebuke
description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. It must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

name: Speak with Animals
description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.

name: Unseen Servant
components: V, S, M (a piece of string and a bit of wood)
description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.

name: Flame Blade
description: You evoke a fiery blade in your free hand; you can make melee spell attacks with it to deal fire damage.

name: Flaming Sphere
components: V, S, M (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)
description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space; creatures that end their turn within 5 feet make a Dexterity save or take fire damage.

name: Gentle Repose
components: V, S, M (a pinch of salt and a copper piece placed on each of the corpse's eyes, which the spell consumes)
description: You touch a corpse or remains; the target is protected from decay and cannot become undead for the duration.

name: Protection from Poison
description: You touch a creature; it neutralizes one poison and grants advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and it has resistance to poison damage for the duration.

name: Silence
description: No sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

name: Warding Bond
components: V, S, M (a pair of platinum rings worth at least 50 gp each, which you and the target must wear for the duration)
description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection; the target gets +1 bonus to AC and saving throws and resistance to all damage, but each time it takes damage, you take the same amount.

name: Blink
description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns; on 11 or higher, you vanish from your current plane and appear in the Ethereal Plane until the start of your next turn.

name: Call Lightning
description: A storm cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder; on each of your turns, you can call down a bolt of lightning that strikes a point you can see within range.

name: Fear
components: V, S, M (a white feather or the heart of a hen)
description: Project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears; each creature in a 30-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom save or drop what it is holding and become frightened.

name: Gaseous Form
components: V, S, M (a bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke)
description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
components: S, M (a glowing stick of incense or a crystal vial filled with phosphorescent material)
description: You create a twisting pattern of colors; each creature in a 30-foot cube who sees the pattern must make a Wisdom save or become charmed and incapacitated with a speed of 0.

name: Tongues
components: V, S, M (a small clay model of a ziggurat)
description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears and makes the target understood by any creature that knows at least one language.

name: Beacon of Hope
description: This spell bestows hope and vitality; choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

name: Bestow Curse
description: Touch a creature; the target must succeed on a Wisdom save or become cursed, suffering an effect of your choice.

name: Plant Growth
description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a 100-foot radius centered on a point within range, either enriching the land or making vegetation thick and overgrown.

name: Create Food and Water
description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours.

name: Glyph of Warding
components: V, S, M (incense and powdered diamond worth at least 200 gp, which the spell consumes)
description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, either explosive runes or a spell glyph storing a 3rd-level or lower spell.

name: Mass Healing Word
description: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Meld into Stone
description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all the equipment you carry with the stone.

name: Sending
components: V, S, M (a short piece of fine copper wire)
description: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar; the target hears the message in its mind and can reply in a like manner.

name: Speak with Dead
description: You grant the semblance of life and intelligence to a corpse within range, allowing it to answer the questions you pose.

name: Spirit Guardians
description: You call forth spirits to protect you; their area moves with you, and affected creatures make a Wisdom save or take radiant or necrotic damage (your choice) and have halved speed while in the area.

name: Feign Death
components: V, S, M (a pinch of graveyard dirt)
description: You touch a willing creature and put it into a cataleptic state that is indistinguishable from death.

name: Speak with Plants
description: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation, giving them the ability to communicate with you and follow simple commands.

name: Wind Wall
components: V, S, M (a tiny fan and a feather of an exotic bird)
areaOfEffect: Wall up to 50 ft long, 15 ft high, 1 ft thick
description: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground; it keeps fog, smoke, and other gases at bay, and small flying creatures or projectiles are deflected.

name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
components: V, S, M (a small crystal bead)
description: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you; the atmosphere inside is comfortable and dry regardless of the weather outside.

name: Major Image
components: V, S, M (a bit of fleece)
description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube and includes sound, smell, and temperature.

name: Nondetection
components: V, S, M (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)
description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic; the target can't be targeted by scrying sensors.

name: Phantom Steed
description: You summon a large, quasi-real, horselike creature. It uses your statistics for checks where relevant, and has a speed of 100 feet.

name: Slow
components: V, S, M (a drop of molasses)
areaOfEffect: Up to 6 creatures in a 40-foot cube
description: You alter time around up to six creatures, reducing their speed, imposing -2 penalty to AC and Dex saves, and limiting reactions and actions on a failed Wisdom save.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force; make a melee spell attack to deal necrotic damage and you regain hit points equal to half the amount dealt.

name: Friends
components: S, M (a small amount of makeup applied to the face as this spell is cast)
description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile toward you. When the spell ends, the creature realizes you used magic to influence its mood and may become hostile at the GM's discretion.

name: Thorn Whip
components: V, S, M (the stem of a plant with thorns)
description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns. Make a melee spell attack against a target within range. On a hit, the creature takes piercing damage and, if it is Large or smaller, you can pull it up to 10 feet closer to you.

name: Color Spray
components: V, S, M (a pinch of colored sand, a red feather, or a crystal)
description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand. Roll 6d10; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect, starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points in the area. Creatures are blinded until the spell ends for them.

name: Find Familiar
components: V, S, M (10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier)
description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form of your choice. It acts independently of you but always obeys your commands. If it drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving no physical form behind.

name: Tenser's Floating Disk
components: V, S, M (a drop of mercury)
description: You create a circular, horizontal plane of force, 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick, that floats 3 feet above the ground and remains for the duration. It can hold up to 500 pounds and follows you at a distance of 20 feet.

name: Heroism
description: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.

name: Illusory Script
components: S, M (a lead-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)
description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that is legible only to creatures you designate. All others see an entirely different message or no writing at all.

name: Inflict Wounds
description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage. The spell's damage increases when you cast it using higher-level slots.

name: Silent Image
components: V, S, M (a bit of fleece)
description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon no larger than a 15-foot cube. The image is purely visual; it isn't accompanied by sound, smell, or other sensory effects.

name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
components: V, S, M (tiny tarts and a feather that is waved in the air)
description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter if it fails a Wisdom saving throw, becoming prone and incapacitated for the duration.

name: Witch Bolt
components: V, S, M (a twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning)
description: A beam of crackling, blue energy lances out toward a creature within range, forming a sustained arc of lightning between you and the target. On a hit, the target takes lightning damage, and on subsequent turns you can use your action to deal more damage automatically.

name: Ray of Sickness
description: A sickening greenish energy ray lashes out toward a creature within range. On a hit, the target takes poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of your next turn.

name: Detect Evil and Good
description: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located.

name: Divine Favor
description: Your prayer empowers your strikes with radiant energy. Until the spell ends, your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage on a hit.

name: Alter Self
description: You assume a different form. Choose aquatic adaptation, change appearance, or natural weapons. The chosen effect lasts for the duration.

name: Animal Messenger
components: V, S, M (a morsel of food)
description: By means of this spell, you use an animal to deliver a message. Choose a Tiny beast you can see within range; it carries your message to a location you describe.

name: Arcane Lock
components: V, S, M (gold dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)
description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked for the duration. You can set a password or designate creatures that can pass without the lock ending.

name: Calm Emotions
description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people. Each humanoid in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a Charisma save; you can suppress the charmed or frightened condition, or make indifferent those hostile toward you and your companions.

name: Continual Flame
components: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)
description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch. The effect looks like a regular flame but creates no heat and doesn't use oxygen.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: You can read the thoughts of certain creatures. You initially learn the surface thoughts of the creature you choose, and with your action you can probe deeper if it fails a save.

name: Find Traps
description: You sense the presence of any trap within range that is within line of sight. A trap includes anything that would inflict a sudden or unexpected effect you consider harmful or undesirable.

name: Heat Metal
components: V, S, M (a piece of iron and a flame)
description: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot and harm the creature holding or wearing it.

name: Locate Object
description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

name: Magic Weapon
description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls (higher at higher slots).

name: Moonbeam
components: V, S, M (several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar)
description: A silvery beam of pale light shines down in a 5-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. A creature entering the area or starting its turn there takes radiant damage, or half on a successful save.

name: Pass without Trace
components: V, S, M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. You gain a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means.

name: Prayer of Healing
description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points. The amount healed increases when you cast the spell using higher-level slots.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon.

name: Suggestion
components: V, M (a snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil)
description: You suggest a course of activity and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. On a failed save, it pursues the course you described to the best of its ability.
